speaker: Teo
text: Tee, this is a new rock group. Do you like them?

speaker: Ty
text: No, not really, Teeoh. It sounds like heavy metal.

speaker: Teo
text: No, it doesn’t! I like them a lot.

speaker: Ty
text: I don’t really like loud music.

speaker: Teo
text: So, what kind of music do you like?

speaker: Ty
text: Well, I love classical music. And I like some hiphop, too.

speaker: Teo
text: I love hiphop! What about this song?

speaker: Teo
text: I love it! Turn it up!
